name: symfony-cmf/seo-bundle
description: Symfony CMF Search Engine Optimization Bundle

suggest.symfony-cmf/core-bundle: When using the provided PHPCR-ODM document
suggest.symfony-cmf/routing-bundle: To make use of the alternate locale provider.
suggest.doctrine/phpcr-bundle: To persist the metadata in PHPCR ODM documents
suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: To persist the metadata in ORM entities
suggest.doctrine/orm: To persist the metadata in ORM entities, ~2.4
suggest.burgov/key-value-form-bundle: To have advanced editing options in the SEO form type, ^1.0
suggest.symfony-cmf/sonata-admin-integration-bun: To provide an admin interface for the PHPCR ODM documents.
